name: Gamba Hell
description:
The music might be a bit glitchy on the browser version, download for a better experience.

Controls:

Move: W/A/S/D

Aim: Mouse

Attack: Right Mouse Button

Move Coins: Left Mouse Button (click and hold)

Credits:

2pfrog - Art

Alexander Lahti (The Seahorse) - Programming

Mikael Mollberg - Programming

Johannes Baeckman - Sound

Submission to the 2022 GMTK Game Jam
